c

div.p: Highland Park School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, gender, sexual identity, sexual orientation, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the districts activities and programs. Highland Park School District also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
